mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.zhuanjia_uuid_number as zhuanjiaUuidNumber ,a.zhuanjia_name as zhuanjiaName ,a.zhuanjia_phone as zhuanjiaPhone ,a.zhuanjia_id_number as zhuanjiaIdNumber ,a.zhuanjia_photo as zhuanjiaPhoto ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zhuanjia a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.zhuanjia_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaUuidNumber},'%')
and a.zhuanjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaName},'%')
and a.zhuanjia_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaPhone},'%')
and a.zhuanjia_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaIdNumber},'%')
and a.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
